==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|けん|きゅう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=けんきゅう}} {{m|zh|研究|tr=ngen *kiu<sup>H</sup>?}}. Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} ''ngiên-kiu'', {{etyl|cdo|-}} ''ngiĕng-géu'', {{etyl|nan|-}} ''gián-kiù''.

The original [[音読み#Japanese|''on'yomi'']] for the first character {{ja-l|研}} was ''gen'', more closely matching the Chinese origins. For reasons unknown, the reading shifted from ''gen'' to a [[慣用読み#Japanese|''kan'yō yomi'']] of ''ken''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|けんきゅう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|けんきゅう}}

# a piece of [[research]], a [[study]], [[investigation]]
#* '''1928''', 寺田寅彦, 雑感:
#*: {{ja-usex|間違える事なしには'''研究'''は進められない。|まちがえる こと なし に は '''けんきゅう''' は すすめられない。|Research cannot advance without mistakes along the way.}}
